# SearchScope enumeration

Enumeration of scopes to search for pages

```csharp
public enum SearchScope
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Section | `0` | Search in a OneNote section. |
| SectionGroup | `1` | Search in a OneNote section group. |
| Notebook | `2` | Search in a OneNote notebook. |
| AllNotebooks | `3` | All notebooks open in OneNote. |
